website_summaries.verdict: In this affordable price range, the Jays a-Jays One+ represents a good deal for in-canal earphones, but it's not the only option worth your attention.
pros: Solid audio performance with no distortion
cons: Cable is bulky for a pair of in-ears
Sound signature could use a bit more brightness

customer_reviews.title: No tangles but at what cost?
customer_reviews.text: The sound is good and the cables are virtually impossible to tangle but the flat cables are quite heavy and they always snag on clothing. The weight of the cable seems to pull down on the earphones causing pressure on the ears or the phones to fall out. I have to wear them with the cable under my shirt or jacket to stop the cable flapping around and pulling down. Also the flat edges of the cable rub against clothing more than a round cable, which you hear through your earphones. So it's best to use them when you're not moving. I will stick to cloth covered cable in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Angry from Berkhamsted

customer_reviews.title: I give up! Simply because they are faulty!
customer_reviews.text: This is my fifth pair of Jays’ earphones. Cannot get more dissapointed than this and i do not recommend them! Few years ago, I bought my fourth pair in the airport without testing it and regretted it after because one side of the earphones was faulty even when it was brand new. Until lately, i thought i should try it again because the sound quality was good, but this fifth is also a faulty product! I have to return them!!
customer_reviews.author: M K

customer_reviews.title: Volume controls don't work with Android version Kit Kat
customer_reviews.text: The volume controls do not work on the latest version of Android. This is a product "built for Android" yet the App that accompanies these headphones does not work on the latest version of Android. The volume controls do not work on the latest version of Android, they are not supported. That is absurd. I could have bought the cheaper product instead which does not have volume controls.
customer_reviews.author: R. London

customer_reviews.title: Ear piece stopped working within a week of use
customer_reviews.text: Such a shame as Jays were recommended to me by trusted sources as a musician. Mistakes happen, but for one ear piece to stop working within a week and to have a cracking input from the go is really poor show. Also worth noting that rubbing the metal mini-jack can help remove any oxidization that causes crackles, although this didn't fully solve my issues.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: The packaging is great
customer_reviews.text: I was delighted to get the product the packaging is great and has extra ear buds. The wire is flat and so does not tangle easy. I generally use ear phones for audio books and judge them based on whether I can hear the book when going under a tunnel on the tube I couldn't so really they are no different from the headphones I got with my phone. They do however look great.
customer_reviews.author: Creative Butterfly

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: The best headphones I have ever had. They can get tangled now and then but its a simple cross fix unlike over headphone where it turns into a tangled mess. If you like listing to music in bed before you sleep, I really recommend these pair. Overall great quality in sound, design and package.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Cresswell

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed - broke after 2 years despite limited use - generates a lot of noise when moving
customer_reviews.text: Bought in March 2014, the right ear earphone broke in June 2016 although I took good care of these earphones, always packing them neatly after use. Warranty is 24 months so no replacement. This is the last time I'm buying Jays. The flat cable excels at keeping it tangle-free, but it creates a lot of noise in the ears (you hear it "cracking") at the slightest movement of the cable e.g. when walking etc. I didn't even try running with these but it would not be impressive I suspect. Overall I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lorenzo

customer_reviews.title: These babies are a Best Buy they out do them selves compared to all ...
customer_reviews.text: These babies are a Best Buy they out do them selves compared to all the other ear buds I have tried in the price range.
customer_reviews.author: m.carnegie

customer_reviews.title: Good for balanced sound and android phones
customer_reviews.text: Nice sounding earphones with anti-tangle cable that actually works. Not for bassheads as sound is balanced rather than bass heavy. Was disappointed when left speaker failed after 9 months but replaced under warranty without any issue.
customer_reviews.author: T. Nightingale

customer_reviews.title: Sound and Ear
customer_reviews.text: First of all, attempting to get the headphones to even stay in my ears or for that matter, anyone else's ears is near impossible. If you slightly move or stand up they will fall out (no matter the size of the plastic bits). Sound quality is what I was sort of disappointed on. It has nice treble but seems to be lacking quite highly in Bass. Now I'm not one for huge bass, however it seems to be fully lacking it with only minor bass.
customer_reviews.author: Grant

customer_reviews.title: Good sound quality but they're too heavy for my small ears.
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is good but they don't stay in my ears. Although they are tangle free they are quite heavy and the need to constantly push them back into my ears is quite annoying. I'll buy a new pair soon as there's no way I could wear them If I went running. If you have small ears and usually need to wear the smaller sized buds I think you'd be better off with a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Kizzy Bolton

customer_reviews.title: Not that good....
customer_reviews.text: Not that impressed by them really. They don't sit comfortably in my ear (regardless of bud used), they leak sound and they are far too bassy. The good thing though is that they don't tangle up in by bag because of the flat cable design.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. M. Thornton

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality for great price
customer_reviews.text: These earphones are the best iv ever owned, i cant say anything bad about the sound quality, they are awesome. Two slightly negative things about there design though. after about 30mins of listening, they start to hurt my ear as the earphone plastic sort of digs into the skin on my ear, but its not that bad and well worth the slight pain for the great sound. also the app doesnt really work on my htc one x, only function i can get working is the play,pause and answer/hang up functions. Overall i would recommend them
customer_reviews.author: Jack Luke

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Headset
customer_reviews.text: sturdy case and plenty of choice with the ear buds, although the ones supplied already fitted were fine. download the app and you have even more choice about the customisation of what the controls do. pleasant sound and nice deep bass in-ear exactly what was required and wanted. Brilliant.
customer_reviews.author: Elkor

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: Like it. Plugged it into my nexus 4 and works fine. The Jays app in android also works fine but somehow my music app has the similar control function and they somehow mess up. However, I got around them easily by disabling one of the control function on one of them. Deserve a 5 star if the price is lower!
customer_reviews.author: Su Ki Lam

customer_reviews.title: Great value, superb quality
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for an Android compatible headset with a sound quality good enough for listening to music. Most of the acceptable buds are made for iphone, so it wasn't easy. I ran into Jays accidentally, read a few reviews and then decided to go for it and didn't regret my decision for a second. Sound is great, a little too much bass maybe, but definitely excellent for the price. I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan Solt

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound... Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I love these. Totally tangle free and great to use with my Samsung S3. The sound is great. Anyone who has complained about the sound should consider using the PowerAmp app on android. Bass is great. Most comfortable in ear phones I have had.
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: If you have Android, this was built for you
customer_reviews.text: The remote control application works perfectly, one button - full control. Sound is heavy without lacking detail, the design is pleasantly understated. For the asking price I could not be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good choice if in need of earphones
customer_reviews.text: I really like these earphones and use them almost every day. They are really tangle free and all. I couldn't make the android app work, though, but I might have been the reason for that, cos I kept a conflicting app ;)
customer_reviews.author: deckoff

customer_reviews.title: Back cover fell off!
customer_reviews.text: The back cover of the left ear bud fell out! I can't find how to claim a warranty replacement on my mobile. The earphones are only a month old!
customer_reviews.author: JEM SNOWDON

customer_reviews.title: Very good!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My brother requested to get this for him.... He loved the product and is very good... Satisfied with the product...
customer_reviews.author: shru

customer_reviews.title: Great till they break
customer_reviews.text: Really like the sounds and the looks of these, but after 4 months my first pair broke, now my second pair is broken in under 2 months, same fault both times (right earpiece is drastically quieter than the left earpiece).
customer_reviews.author: imadefan

customer_reviews.title: Rattle in my headphones
customer_reviews.text: Developed a rattle in one of the ears within a couple of months. Highly annoying. Buyer - it would be good to get some feedback on how/if I can fix it?
customer_reviews.author: Joe Newell

customer_reviews.title: Does not work fully with Samsung Galaxy S4
customer_reviews.text: Google nobbled the handling of single-button remotes in Android 4.1. This means multi-click commands, such as volume change, will no longer work. No sign of a change-of-heart or a fix yet, unless you root your device. Even the single-click commands had problems on my Galaxy S4, for example - as Spotify would get replaced by the media player. Maybe there's a way round that one. Were it not for this problem, I would have given the product at least 4 stars as sound was good, non-tangle cable good, and a one-button control would have been ideal for me. Didn't get to test the mic. Returned for refund. Now looking for an alternative.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. C. A. Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Quality Sound
customer_reviews.text: I own multiple pairs of headphones, Urbanears, Beats (in ear) and sony. All well over the €50 mark i.e beats (which broke) & Sony. I wanted a decent quality headphone for 50 as to often have expensive headphones brake months down the line. I read many reviews on the product and did some research and im very happy to report that the Jays headphones are quality. The packaging is very nice and they come with 4 different sized buds. I have yet to see them get tangled and the sound quality is just right. I would genuinely recommend these headphones as they sound great and look even better!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen O'Farrell

customer_reviews.title: What I expected
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for earphones for my nexus 4 so I can use it for calls Isolate noise and not entangled as expecte I just missed a clip to tie to my coat
customer_reviews.author: sergio

customer_reviews.title: Very bad quality!
customer_reviews.text: I've just unboxed these hoping for quality headphones, as I've read in previous reviews but as soon as I plugged them in I noticed that if I moved the cord a bit, the right headphone will stop working completely! Also, the remote doesn't work with Android 4.1, even after installing their Jays Headset app from Google Play. Very very very disappointed! Returned and asked for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: inrya

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable and limited remote functions.
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is acceptable but personally I couldn't find a set of earbuds that were comfortable. However, the rubberised cable is the most annoying thing about these earphones. When running the cable underneath clothing, from inside a jacket pocket for example, it snags and grips constantly so they always feel like they're being pulled out of your ears. It does serve the purpose of not tangling, though, to be fair. As stated in other reviews, the remote has limited functionality due to the more recent Android updates.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Alan Griffin

customer_reviews.title: brilliant headphones, but left earphone always breaks
customer_reviews.text: I was really impressed by these headphones, but I've gone through my third pair now. They work for the first two months and then the left earphone (the one without the mic) breaks. It's a real shame since they are brilliant headphones,and give the product two stars with a heavy heart
customer_reviews.author: JJG

product_meta.title: Jays a-Jays T00085 One + Earphones includes remote - Black
product_meta.description:
AWARD WINNING A-JAYS ONE+ - MADE FOR MANY
 * 
 * 
 * Click here for a larger image

On a-JAYS One+ we've added a one-button remote with a built in mic so you can control talk and music on your mobile device. They are optimised for Android phones but also work great with Windows phones like Nokia Lumia and all Apple iOS devices. You get the same award winning sound as on a-JAYS One and our beloved tangle free cables. Out of the box you can control Play/Pause, Answer/Hang up and with the free of charge JAYS Headset Control App for Android you will be able to add functions such as volume control, track control etc. Go check it out and experience something new, something great!

THIS IS WHERE IT ALL BEGINS
a-JAYS One+ comes loaded with a 8.6mm dynamic speaker engineered by JAYS. It is the perfect partner for on-the-go music enjoyment as it efficiently blocks out ambient noise. a-JAYS One+ is perfect for use when out and about with your MP3 player or phone. The remote and microphone keep you available and in constant control with only a few finger clicks.

No more annoyingly tangled cables. JAYS newly-developed flat cable technology delivers precise, full-bodied sound with minimum tangle.
Click here for a larger image

A TANGLE-FREE, FLAT CABLE
Take charge of your earphones! Stop worrying about tangled cables and ill-fitting ear pieces. The a-JAYS Series is bursting with product innovations such as the newly-developed, tangle-resistant, flat cable. It is supplied with up to five pairs of silicone sleeves designed to give you the best possible earphone fit meaning that you can take superior sound and design quality with you wherever you go. No more annoyingly tangled cables. JAYS newly-developed flat cable technology delivers precise, full-bodied sound with minimum tangle. As well as being extremely practical and flexible, this 5mm wide cable is a design classic and will make you stand out from the crowd.

REMOTE WITH MIC
The remote with built in microphone enables you to pick up calls / hang up calls and play / pause your music. The remote works with your local music library as well as with streamed music / video content via your smartphone applications such as Spotify and YouTube. You can also control your calls when using applications such as Skype and iChat. 

 With the free JAYS Headset Control™ app for Android you can now turn your a-JAYS One+ into a fully customised multi feature control
Click here for a larger image

JAYS HEADSET CONTROL ANDROID APP - DESIGN YOUR OWN CONTROLS
 If you are using an Android smartphone you are now also able to add even more features to your a-JAYS One+ headset by downloading our android application JAYS Headset Control. You can design your own headset control – your own bespoke set up. Discover even more features with JAYS Headset Control™ app for Android. With this app you can now turn your a-JAYS One+ into a fully customised multi feature control. Change volume, skip songs, voice control and much more. And of course it’s free and can be downloaded from Google Play. Just make a search in your Android phone for JAYS and install and you’re ready to go.

KEEPING NOISE AT BAY
The a-JAYS One+ uses soft silicone sleeves which envelop the earpiece and reduce surrounding sound by up to 40dB. This offers a far superior listening experience in ambient environments.

IT'S ALL ABOUT THE RHYTHM
The a-JAYS Series gives up a rich, deep bass response and will help you to discover your music all over again. The rhythm sections in your favorite tunes will be uplifted and reinvigorated; music has never been so much fun.

a-JAYS One+ comes with up to 5 pairs of silicone sleeves ranging in size from XXS to LClick here for a larger image

A NATURAL, COMFORTABLE FIT - CHOOSE FROM 5 PAIRS OF SILICONE SLEEVES INCLUDED
a-JAYS One+ comes with up to 5 pairs of silicone sleeves ranging in size from XXS to L. This choice means all a-JAYS users can achieve a natural, comfortable fit, and maximum external sound insulation. Use the gift box included to store your silicone sleeves when not in use or to protect them when you’re on the go.

AWARD WINNING
Since being introduced, the earphones in the a-JAYS series have been getting loads of positive reviews and awards for their sound, sleek shape and flat tangle-free cables.

COMPATIBILITY
 The remote and mic of a-JAYS One+ work with most HTC, Samsung, BlackBerry, Sony (released 2012 and later), LG, Nokia Lumia Series, Motorola and Apple devices (MacBook, iPhone, iPad, iPod). Functions may vary between models. The remote and mic are also compatible with most applications such as VOIP, Skype, iChat and other recording applications such as voice memo.

ABOUT A-JAYS
 JAYS represents high quality and a true sound reproduction. The a-JAYS earphones feature a newly-developed 8.6mm driver designed to enhance your music’s rhythmic section without compromising any of the detail in other frequencies. Furthermore the a-JAYS feature a new flat, tangle-free cable to make listening experience easier still. Just enjoy!

The a-JAYS earphones feature a newly-developed 8.6mm driver designed to enhance your music’s rhythmic section

TECHNICAL SPECIFICATION
DRIVER
 * Type: 8.6 mm Dynamic Speaker
 * Sensitivity: 95dB @ 1kHz
 * Impedance: 16 Ohm @ 1kHz
 * Frequency Response: 20 Hz – 18 000 Hz

EARPHONES
 * Finish: Matte
 * Isolation: -40 dB@ 2kHz
 * Size: (L) 18.3 x (W) 11.8 x (H) 13.8 mm
 * Weight: 14 grams (0.49 oz)

CORD
 * Type: TPE coated flat tangle free cable
 * Size: Width 5mm / Thickness 1.2mm
 * Length: 115 cm (45 in)
 * Plug: L-shaped, Silver-Plated Stereo Plug 3.5mm (1/8 in)

REMOTE
 * Controls: 1 button remote
 * Mic: Yes

the new a-JAYS Series gives you a listening experience that is far superior to that of the standard earbuds packaged with your MP3 player or phone.
Click here for a larger image

SOUND PRESSURE, DECIBEL AND HZ 
 Sound is an invisible vibration composed of frequencies which travel in undulations known as sound waves. The amplitude of vibration produced by an object such as a speaker driver is proportional to the change of pressure generated as the wave moves through the medium which surrounds it (such as air). Therefore, the amplitude of a sound wave is commonly measured by its pressure level. 

 The decibel is a non-dimensional, logarithmic scale to denote a relative change in the strength of a signal or wave. When placed in the context of sound pressure level; it measures the nominal threshold of human hearing, relative to the quietest sound audible to the human ear. 

 The frequency of instances where a sound wave reaches its peak during a period of time is measured in Hz (hertz). This is the number of complete cycles per second. Human hearing is limited to frequencies between about 20 Hz and 20,000 Hz.

SENSITIVITY AND IMPEDANCE
 Earphone sensitivity is measured in Sound Pressure Level (SPL). This is essentially a measurement of how loud or easily driven a pair of earphones is. The sensitivity is also influenced by the drivers’ coil impedance which varies over the frequency range. The higher the SPL and the lower the impedance the more easily driven your earphones will be. 

With JAYS Headset Control app you can change volume, skip songs, voice control and much more. And of course it’s free and can be downloaded from Google Play.
Click here for a larger image

THIS IS JAYS - LOVE MUSIC
Our mission started out in Sweden in a small scale with a global scope of not letting go when it comes to stronger musical experiences in the canvas of all people’s everyday life. People are pretty much the same over the world and we all strive towards better in all things that we do and that we are. Our way of making better is to do exactly what we do, greatly enhancing the experience of mobile music.

We know that our fans and users makes a JAYS Generation, that always looks for better and expect us to provide it. Simply because we can, we keep it simple and develop advanced hi-tech in black and white at affordable prices in innovative award-winning products. We believe that the colour should be deep in the music and not in the surface. Since we develop our own designs, we don´t have to hide them. Simplicity and quality is always in fashion and we have a great love for music, art and innovation. Technology is just our means for making it human.

This is our way of passing on our vision to our respected users, setting a new standard on what to expect when expecting better. As all good things, we are a work in progress, but we have come a long way in a few years. We would love it if you would like to join us, proving that we are doing it right. Since without you, this would be nothing.



BOX CONTAINS
a-Jays earphones; Silicone sleeves
feature_bullets: Rich, deep bass response that will help you to discover your music all over again
Works with most HTC, Samsung, BlackBerry, LG, Motorola and Apple devices
Remote features a built in microphone
